definitions.title: n.pr.
definitions.body: of wady running NW. through plain of Megiddo (Esdraelon), K(e)iswn (?stream of (god) Kish RS:Sem. i. 155; 2nd ed. 170);—alw. ´[[נַחַל ק]]: Ju Jdg 4:7, Jdg 4:13, Jdg 5:21, Jdg 5:21, Ps 83:10, also 1Ki 18:40; mod. Nahrel-Muḳ;aṭṭaJ; v. Buhl:Geogr. 106, 209, GASm:Geogr.382.
